00008 #include "vieweditor.h"

00010 #include <models/component.h>
00011 #include <models/view.h>
00012 #include <LibraryManager/libraryinterface.h>
00013 #include <LibraryManager/vlnv.h>
00014 #include <models/filebuilder.h>

00016 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00017 #include <QFormLayout>
00018 #include <QHBoxLayout>
00019 #include <QLabel>
00020 #include <QSizePolicy>
00021 
00022 ViewEditor::ViewEditor(QSharedPointer<Component> component, 
00023                                            void* dataPointer,
00024                                            LibraryInterface* libHandler,
00025                                            QWidget *parent): 
00026 ItemEditor(component, parent), 
00027 libHandler_(libHandler),
00028 component_(component),
00029 view_(static_cast<View*>(dataPointer)),
00030 nameGroup_(this, tr("View name and description")),
00031 viewTypeSelector_(),
00032 envIdentifier_(view_, this),
00033 stack_(this),
00034 flatTabs_(&stack_),
00035 generalTab_(component, view_, &flatTabs_),
00036 parametersTab_(view_, this),
00037 fileBuildersTab_(&view_->getDefaultFileBuilders(), this),
00038 hierarchyRef_(view_, component_, libHandler, &stack_) {
00039 
00040         Q_ASSERT_X(dataPointer, "ViewEditor constructor",
00041                 "Null data pointer given as parameter");
00042 
00043         // set the possible options to the view type selector.
00044         viewTypeSelector_.addItem(tr("hierarchical"));
00045         viewTypeSelector_.addItem(tr("non-hierarchical"));
00046 
00047         // add the widget to edit hierarchy reference to index 0 in the stackWidget
00048         stack_.addWidget(&hierarchyRef_);
00049         // ans tab widget that contains widgets to edit flat views to index 1
00050         stack_.addWidget(&flatTabs_);
00051 
00052         // set up the tab widget for flat tabs
00053         flatTabs_.addTab(&generalTab_, tr("General"));
00054         flatTabs_.addTab(&fileBuildersTab_, tr("Default file builders"));
00055         flatTabs_.addTab(&parametersTab_, tr("Parameters"));
00056 
00057         setupLayout();
00058         
00059         connect(&nameGroup_, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)),
00060                 this, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00061         connect(&nameGroup_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00062                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00063         connect(&envIdentifier_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00064                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00065         connect(&hierarchyRef_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00066                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00067         connect(&viewTypeSelector_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
00068                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00069         connect(&generalTab_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00070                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00071         connect(&fileBuildersTab_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00072                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00073         connect(&parametersTab_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00074                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00075 
00076         // when user changes the view type the correct editor is displayed
00077         connect(&viewTypeSelector_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
00078                 &stack_, SLOT(setCurrentIndex(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00079 
00080         nameGroup_.setName(view_->getName());
00081         nameGroup_.setDisplayName(view_->getDisplayName());
00082         nameGroup_.setDescription(view_->getDescription());
00083 
00084         envIdentifier_.restoreChanges();        
00085 
00086         // if view is hierarchical then set it to be selected
00087         if (view_->isHierarchical()) {
00088                 viewTypeSelector_.setCurrentIndex(0);
00089                 hierarchyRef_.restoreChanges();
00090         }
00091         else {
00092                 viewTypeSelector_.setCurrentIndex(1);
00093                 generalTab_.restoreChanges();
00094                 parametersTab_.restoreChanges();
00095                 fileBuildersTab_.restoreChanges();
00096         }
00097 }
00098 
00099 ViewEditor::~ViewEditor() {
00100 }
00101 
00102 bool ViewEditor::isValid() const {
00103         
00104         // if name group is not valid
00105         if (!nameGroup_.isValid())
00106                 return false;
00107 
00108         // if environment identifiers have not been defined
00109         else if (!envIdentifier_.isValid())
00110                 return false;
00111         
00112         // if view is hierarchical make sure the vlnv ref is valid
00113         if (viewTypeSelector_.currentIndex() == 0)
00114                 return hierarchyRef_.isValid();
00115 
00116         // if view is not hierarchical make sure all it's elements are valid
00117         else 
00118                 return generalTab_.isValid() && parametersTab_.isValid() &&
00119                 fileBuildersTab_.isValid();
00120 }
00121 
00122 void ViewEditor::setupLayout() {
00123 
00124         QFormLayout* viewTypeLayout = new QFormLayout();
00125         viewTypeLayout->addRow(tr("View type"), &viewTypeSelector_);
00126 
00127         QVBoxLayout* topLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00128         topLayout->addWidget(&nameGroup_);
00129         topLayout->addWidget(&envIdentifier_, 1);
00130         topLayout->addLayout(viewTypeLayout);
00131         topLayout->addWidget(&stack_);
00132 }
00133 
00134 void ViewEditor::removeModel() {
00135         component_->removeView(view_->getName());
00136         view_ = 0;
00137 }
00138 
00139 void ViewEditor::makeChanges() {
00140         // if not valid do nothing
00141         if (!isValid())
00142                 return;
00143 
00144         view_->setName(nameGroup_.getName());
00145         view_->setDisplayName(nameGroup_.getDisplayName());
00146         view_->setDescription(nameGroup_.getDescription());
00147 
00148         envIdentifier_.applyChanges();
00149 
00150         // if hierarchical view is selected
00151         if (viewTypeSelector_.currentIndex() == 0) {
00152                 hierarchyRef_.applyChanges();
00153                 return;
00154         }
00155         // if view is not hierarhical
00156         else {
00157                 generalTab_.applyChanges();
00158                 parametersTab_.applyChanges();
00159                 fileBuildersTab_.applyChanges();
00160         }
00161 }
